S02P01-INV-001.title: Inventory Service Available
S02P01-INV-001.description: The inventory service must respond with module list

S02P02-TIME-003.title: Time Synchronization
S02P02-TIME-003.description: System time must be synchronized within 100ms

S03P01-GNSS-001.title: GNSS Position Accuracy
S03P01-GNSS-001.description: GNSS position must have accuracy within 5 meters

S04P01-INTF-001.title: Interface Contract Compliance
S04P01-INTF-001.description: All interfaces must comply with ITxPT schema definitions
